posts.message:
Anyone have a problem with VPN / sites like DO / bitbucket on TeData ADSL connection?

My problem is that git push fails on ADSL also  login to DO site.
Works perfectly on Vodafone 3g internet

posts.description: Amazon.com Inc. is in talks to acquire Dubai-based online retailer Souq.com FZ for about $1 billion in a deal that will give the e-commerce giant a footprint in the high-growth Middle East market, according to people familiar with the matter.
